metadata.name: Spike Shield
metadata.description:
• Passive • Become immune to all spikes and spike-related hazards • Can give Paper Isaac transformation • Repentance and multiplayer support
This protects you from all spikes and spike-related hazards*, including curse room doors and spiked chests.
[u]Item Pools[/u] • Treasure Room • Shop
[u]Transformation[/u] • Paper Isaac
This item is also included in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1826418847]Paper Isaac modpack[/url].
